attributes.action: Advance a bond issue for public transport infrastructure projects such as Croxley Link
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TfL is unlikely to fund in full a project outside of its area. However public works can be funded by Bond Issues as occurs in the USA and this would be a way of expanding the tube network further and building an estuary airport in the Thames estuary rather than the monstrous Runway 3
